user.title: Connect to Quilt
user.description:
Enter your Quilt account email. Quilt will send you a verification code.

This is an **unofficial** integration. See the repository `DISCLAIMER.md` for details.

data.accept_terms: I understand this is unofficial and I accept the disclaimer
